text: @NikkiHaley Let’s defund the GOP & Trump in particular:135,000 Americans R dead as a result of Trump & the GOP’s gross negligence in responding to the deadly #COVID19 pandemic. But hey try & distract US, when you know damn well that “defund” is short hand for reprioritizing police funding.
